posts.title: GPT-5 Rumors and Speculation
posts.content: Heard from reliable sources that GPT-5 might be released this year. What features do you think it will have? Will it be AGI?

posts.title: Apple Vision Pro Review
posts.content: Just got my hands on the Vision Pro. The display is incredible but the battery life is disappointing. Anyone else having this issue?

posts.title: Quantum Computing Breakthrough
posts.content: New research shows potential for error-corrected quantum computers. Could this be the beginning of the quantum revolution?
